General.Name: XOX Bhd
General.Description: XOX Berhad, an investment holding company, provides mobile telecommunication products and services primarily in Malaysia. It offers SIM cards under the ONEXOX Prepaid, ONEXOX BLACK, and XOX eSIM names. The company also provides e-Wallet, e-commerce, digital advertising, management, fintech, telecommunication, mobile application, merchant acquiring, payment gateway services; and trades in telecommunications airtime as a commodity for Shariah compliant financing. In addition, it is involved in the provision of mobile cellular and other wireless telecommunications network operation; and establishing, managing, and controlling a football club. XOX Berhad was founded in 2005 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
